item.title: Taylor Sheridan's $85M Oscar-Nominated Thriller Lands On Netflix's US Top 10 Chart 10 Years Later
item.description: A thriller movie that was written by Taylor Sheridan becomes a Netflix hit in the United States a decade after its $85 million theatrical run.

item.title: 6 Best Tom Hanks Movies Streaming On Disney+
item.description: Tom Hanks is one of modern cinema's most prolific actors, and some of his best and most famous movies are available to stream on Disney+ right now.

item.title: Plankton: The Movie Review - I'm In Awe Of Netflix's Must-See SpongeBob Animation & Its Ability To Effortlessly Blend Genres
item.description: The delightful animated movie perfectly blends genre and is the musical sci-fi rom-com thriller you didn't know you needed.
